item.title: Jay-Z accused in a civil lawsuit of raping a 13-year-old girl in 2000 along with Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs
item.description: Jay-Z responded with a lengthy statement calling the allegations "idiotic." The accuser is anonymous.

item.title: Biden says U.S. will support Syria and its neighbors after Assad dynasty collapses
item.description: The U.S. plans to support Syria and its neighbors after rebels toppled Assad's dictatorship.

item.title: Donald Trump says he won't try to remove Fed chief Jerome Powell
item.description: Trump has been critical of Powell, whom he first appointed in 2018, and has argued the president should have a say in interest rates.

item.title: Trump is stacking his White House roster with uber-rich backers
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is filling his next administration with billionaires and other mega-wealthy figures.

item.title: NYPD releases 2 new photos of man sought in killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO
item.description: The photos are the latest in a series released by the NYPD of the individual they say is a person of interest wanted for questioning.
